33: עֵ֭ינֶיךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>Thine eyes</n> יִרְא֣וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall behold</n> זָר֑וֹת <sup>2114 </sup> <n>strange women</n> וְ֝לִבְּךָ֗ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>and thine heart</n> יְדַבֵּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>shall utter</n> תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃ <sup>8419 </sup> <n>perverse things</n>

35: הִכּ֥וּנִי <sup>5221 </sup> <n>They have stricken</n> בַל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>did not</n> חָלִיתִי֮ <sup>2470 </sup> <n>me [shalt thou say and] I was not sick</n> הֲלָמ֗וּנִי <sup>1986 </sup> <n>they have beaten</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָ֫דָ֥עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>me [and] I felt</n> מָתַ֥י <sup>4970 </sup> <n>When</n> אָקִ֑יץ <sup>6974 </sup> <n>[it] not when shall I awake</n> א֝וֹסִ֗יף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>it yet</n> אֲבַקְשֶׁ֥נּוּ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>? I will seek</n> עֽוֹד׃ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n>
